Option: imagemanager.urlprefix

This option should contain a URL to where the MCImageManager is located. If the MCImageManager is installed on the system as well, you can integrate them with each other by adding the URL to the MCImageManager to this option and add the "imagemanager" toolname to the general.tools option.

Example of usage in the config.php file:

$mcFileManagerConfig['imagemanager.urlprefix'] = "../imagemanager";

Example of usage in a mc_access file:

imagemanager.urlprefix=../imagemanager
